mapper.select: SELECT member_seq, member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_birth, member_signup_time, member_grade FROM member
SELECT member_seq, member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_birth, member_signup_time, member_grade FROM member WHERE member_seq = #{seq}
SELECT member_seq, member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_birth, member_signup_time, member_grade FROM member WHERE member_id = #{id} AND member_pw = #{pw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_seq, member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_birth, member_grade) VALUES (#{seq}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{grade})
